product_entries.full_product_description: 14.1 | SUPPLY OF HT/ LT CABLES AS PER  ENCLOSED SPECIFICATION | 11 KV(UE) Grade Cables as per typical specifications ; XLPE insulated; PVC Sheathed;  Armoured Aluminium Conductor Cables of Following Sizes As Per Is:1554 (Part-I), IS 7098  Part I & IS 1225-Latest Version  and Sealed properly with  Pvc Caps of following size:- 3C x 240 sqmm (AL)

original_rows.1: 1.1KV(E)  armoured XLPE, FRLS  Control Cable of following size:-
Supply of Flameproof double compression stainless steel cable gland suitable for following XLPE , FRLS cable sizes & as per relevant IS for hazardous area.
